name: Enchanting Catalogue Vol. (Legendary)
entries: This tome contains the secrets to enchanting magical objects.

It can be read over 1 week to learn the recipe for one legendary or lower magical item, determined randomly. Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Tinkering, Teaching, or Arcanist labor tier by 4.
Once this book has been used in this way 4 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
